job_title: Business Intelligence Analyst in San Diego
pros:
Good work culture
Good growth
Open-minded Employees
cons: Sometimes it's overwhelming and unorganized work

review_title: Your experience depends on your manager/department
pros: If you do good work, it will be noticed and you will be considered for advancement.  However if you do poor quality work, that will also be noticed and you will stay right where you are.
cons: Job satisfaction can vary depending on the leadership in your department.  in 20+ years at Sharp, I've had wonderful--and terrible managers.  I do best when I'm given a little direction and then allowed to match my strengths to the needs of the dept.  Some people need more oversight in order to be productive.  The trick is finding a manager who can do either or both, depending on the employee.
